LanguageData.PlantCactus.label: cactus
LanguageData.PlantCactus.description: A decorative desert cactus with colorful flowers. It's not as pretty as other flowers, but lasts a long time.
LanguageData.PlantGoldAgave.label: gold agave plant
LanguageData.PlantGoldAgave.description: Specialized agave developed over many generations by Cactoid farmers. Survives well in cold conditions and yeilds great fruit even in poor soil. Only the Cactoids know the methods of cultivation.
